title: Merge Sprint 1.2a and 1.2b example beads
description: Integrate feature/1-2a-work-bead into the integration branch. This merge bead demonstrates merge operations for parallel sprint work, merging the example work bead from Sprint 1.2a. Serves as reference implementation for merge bead patterns.

dev_prompts: Create merge bead example in examples/example-merge-bead.json demonstrating merge operations
This is a merge bead with issue_type='beads-ralph-merge' and branches_to_merge field populated
The example shows how parallel sprints (like 1.2a) would be merged in an integration sprint
Populate all required merge bead fields including branches_to_merge array
Include dev prompts that guide merge conflict resolution and integration testing
Include QA agents that validate merge integrity and schema compliance
Validate the completed bead with: python3 scripts/validate-bead-schema.py examples/example-merge-bead.json

qa_agents.prompt: Validate that examples/example-merge-bead.json passes schema validation. Run: python3 scripts/validate-bead-schema.py examples/example-merge-bead.json. Report pass/fail status with error details if validation fails.

Review the merge bead example for correctness. Verify: (1) branches_to_merge field is properly set, (2) merge bead has issue_type='beads-ralph-merge', (3) all required fields present, (4) realistic values for a merge operation, (5) dev_prompts guide proper merge handling. Reference docs/schema.md lines 326-396.
